price: তোমাৰ প্ৰতিপালকৰ তৰফৰ পৰা ৰহমতস্বৰূপে; নিশ্চয় তেওঁ সৰ্বশ্ৰোতা, সৰ্বজ্ঞ,
arabic: رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: raḥmatan min rabbika innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
